children.notes: Displays a scrollable list of active non-severe weather alerts. Placed on the left side for larger screens and at the top for smaller screens, serving as the primary navigation for alert details. Its width is constrained to ensure readability and to make space for the alert details panel.

Panel to display detailed information for a selected weather alert. Placed next to the AlertList on larger screens and below it on smaller screens. It expands to fill the available space and allows for vertical scrolling of content.
